The user asked if the waiter is aware of what I chose for appetizers. My first thought is to answer with "Yes" or "No," but I'm not entirely sure. Did I communicate this information already? The initial description was just me thinking about my order, so probably not. Unless the waiter has some way of knowing based on my seating or past orders, which seems unlikely.

Also, maybe there's a mix-up at the restaurant. It's possible that the waiter hasn't had a chance to look at my order yet. But I'm supposed to answer directly and stop after saying yes or no. So, to be honest, I think the waiter isn't aware because I haven't told them yet.
